description: Automatically generates Prisma client and creates migrations when schema.prisma is modified
author: JSONbored
useCases: Keep Prisma client in sync with schema changes
Validate Prisma schema syntax on changes
Generate TypeScript types for database models
Catch schema errors early in development

hookConfig.scriptContent:
#!/bin/bash

# Read the tool input from stdin
INPUT=$(cat)
TOOL_NAME=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.tool_name')
FILE_PATH=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // ""')

if [ -z "$FILE_PATH" ]; then
  exit 0
fi

# Check if this is a Prisma schema file
if [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *schema.prisma ]]; then
    echo "ğŸ”„ Prisma Schema Sync - Processing schema changes..."
    echo "ğŸ“„ Schema file: $FILE_PATH"
    
    # Check if Prisma is available
    if ! command -v npx >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âš ï¸ npx not found. Please install Node.js and npm"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Step 1: Validate schema
    echo "ğŸ” Validating Prisma schema..."
    if npx prisma validate; then
        echo "âœ… Schema validation passed"
    else
        echo "âŒ Schema validation failed - Please fix errors before proceeding"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Step 2: Format schema
    echo "ğŸ“ Formatting Prisma schema..."
    if npx prisma format; then
        echo "âœ… Schema formatted successfully"
    else
        echo "âš ï¸ Schema formatting failed"
    fi
    
    # Step 3: Generate Prisma client
    echo "ğŸ—ï¸ Generating Prisma client..."
    if npx prisma generate; then
        echo "âœ… Prisma client generated successfully"
    else
        echo "âŒ Prisma client generation failed"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Step 4: Create migration (dev mode only)
    if [ "$NODE_ENV" != "production" ]; then
        echo "ğŸ—„ï¸ Creating database migration..."
        MIGRATION_NAME="auto_migration_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)"
        
        if npx prisma migrate dev --name "$MIGRATION_NAME" --create-only; then
            echo "âœ… Migration created: $MIGRATION_NAME"
            echo "âš ï¸ Please review the migration before applying it to your database"
            echo "ğŸ’¡ Apply with: npx prisma migrate dev"
        else
            echo "âš ï¸ Migration creation skipped or failed"
        fi
    else
        echo "â„¹ï¸ Production environment - skipping migration creation"
    fi
    
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ’¡ Prisma Sync Tips:"
    echo "  â€¢ Review generated migrations before applying"
    echo "  â€¢ Use 'npx prisma studio' to explore your database"
    echo "  â€¢ Run 'npx prisma db push' for prototyping"
    echo "  â€¢ Use 'npx prisma migrate reset' to reset development database"
    
    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ¯ Prisma schema sync complete!"
    
else
    echo "â„¹ï¸ File is not a Prisma schema file: $FILE_PATH"
fi

exit 0

PostToolUse.description: Sync Prisma client and create migrations when schema.prisma is modified
